column5: NOK End to end is paying offand Nokia will generate more revenue and profits than ERIC

ERIC should have bought CIEN a few years ago when it was cheap Still not too late CIEN is direct beneficiary of western companies pulling back from Huawei and ZTE And revs have no China exposure Breakout will carry this stock to the 60s next 612 months

CRMD a penny a day keeps the negative awayTho this is an over 5 now so um A dime a day keeps the negative away how is everyone today I jumped into ERIC yesterday and got more today Seems a good longer hold stock 2 to 5 years

I have been pounding the table on non Huawei China names CIEN dominated earnings INSG is picking up a ton of carriers worldwide and have 30 engagements revenue will explode in 20 and 21 ERIC and NOK are taking share as well
